SamPy.bolshoi.collecthalomasses.findDMhaloes

Quick search

SamPy.bolshoi.collecthalomassesÂ¶

Collects dark matter halo information from Bolshoi merger tree files.

This one uses parallel python: http://www.parallelpython.com

Functions

findDMhaloes(file, times, columns) Find all dark matter haloes from a given file that are in self.times.
writeOutput(data, file, times) Writes the output data to ascii files.
